page.title: 12Sport in Framlingham.
page.content: Framlingham Sports Club was founded in 1947,and there are about 350 members. There are seven different sections: badminton,cricket, croquet, hockey, rifle range, soccer and tennis. Framlingham Sports Club owns 15 acres, to the east of the town.The main fund raising event is the annual Gala and other events like car-boot-sales and jumble sales are held.The money goes towards providing and maintaining club equipment. Current major projects are the surfacing of 3 hard tennis courts and the building of a store for the tractors and other equipment. Each section has to provide smaller items for itself, contribute a sum to the general Sports Club funds as well as supporting fund rasing efforts. All the sections compete in local leagues except the quite newly formed croquet section for older members.
